rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for codelist C182517

self.title: CDISC Clinical Classification Kurtzke Functional System Scores KFSS104 Standardized Character Response Terminology

definition: Kurtzke Functional System Scores standardized character result for KFSS104 test and test code.
name: Kurtzke Functional System Scores Clinical Classification STRESC for KFSS104 TN/TC
preferredTerm: CDISC Clinical Classification Kurtzke Functional System Scores KFSS104 Standardized Character Response Terminology
synonyms: Kurtzke Functional System Scores Clinical Classification STRESC for KFSS104 TN/TC

terms.definition: Kurtzke Functional System Scores standardized character result for KFSS104-Normal.
terms.preferredTerm: Kurtzke Functional System Scores KFSS104 Standardized Character Result 0

terms.definition: Kurtzke Functional System Scores standardized character result for KFSS104-Vibration or figure-writing decrease only, in one or two limbs.
terms.preferredTerm: Kurtzke Functional System Scores KFSS104 Standardized Character Result 1

terms.definition: Kurtzke Functional System Scores standardized character result for KFSS104-Mild decrease in touch or pain or position sense, and/or moderate decrease in vibration in one or two limbs; or vibratory (c/s figure writing) decrease alone in three or four limbs.
terms.preferredTerm: Kurtzke Functional System Scores KFSS104 Standardized Character Result 2

terms.definition: Kurtzke Functional System Scores standardized character result for KFSS104-Moderate decrease in touch or pain or position sense, and/or lost vibration in 1 or 2 limbs; or mild decrease in touch or pain and/or moderate decrease in all proprioceptive tests in 3 or 4 limbs.
terms.preferredTerm: Kurtzke Functional System Scores KFSS104 Standardized Character Result 3

terms.definition: Kurtzke Functional System Scores standardized character result for KFSS104-Marked decrease in touch or pain or loss of proprioception, alone or combined, in one or two limbs; or moderate decrease in touch or pain and/or severe proprioceptive decrease in more than two limbs.
terms.preferredTerm: Kurtzke Functional System Scores KFSS104 Standardized Character Result 4

terms.definition: Kurtzke Functional System Scores standardized character result for KFSS104-Loss (essentially) of sensation in one or two limbs; or moderate decrease in touch or pain and/or loss of proprioception for most of the body below the head.
terms.preferredTerm: Kurtzke Functional System Scores KFSS104 Standardized Character Result 5

terms.definition: Kurtzke Functional System Scores standardized character result for KFSS104-Sensation essentially lost below the head.
terms.preferredTerm: Kurtzke Functional System Scores KFSS104 Standardized Character Result 6

terms.definition: Kurtzke Functional System Scores standardized character result for KFSS104-Unknown.
terms.preferredTerm: Kurtzke Functional System Scores KFSS104 Standardized Character Result Unknown
